keywords: convenience@add jacket potato for a complete meal
convenience@add pasta for a complete meal
subtitle: This makes a good filling for baked potatoes or serve with pasta or couscous.

method.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the onion and garlic and cook for 3-4 min, stirring until the onion is softened.
Add the red pepper, green pepper and courgette. Cook for about 5 min until the courgette is beginning to soften.
Add the mushrooms and cook for 3-4 min, stirring occasionally. Serve immediately.

title: Mushroom ratatouille
